channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SLING-11051] JavaDoc Badge Link Broken
item.description:
On most of the projects the link to the JavaDocs is broken due to the badge generator incorrectly using the folder rather than the artifactId.

The following projects seem to be affected:

aggregator
archetype-parent
bundle-archetype
content-package-archetype
feature-converter-maven-plugin
ide-tooling
initial-content-archetype
jcrinstall-bundle-archetype
jspc-maven-plugin
kickstart-maven-plugin
launchpad-standalone-archetype

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Fixed in https://github.com/apache/sling-aggregator/commit/dd287b183d366bf04b298d473e020d2afceb240d

As well as a commits per project to update the badges
